Penn State coach's child sex abuse case goes to jury

Moody's cuts 15 banks' credit ratings

Moody's Investors Service has lowered the ratings of 15 major banks, including Bank of America, JPMorgan Chase, Citigroup, and Goldman Sachs. (AP, 7:19 p.m.)

Obama to visit Boston on Monday

The president will make his first trip of the year to Massachusetts on Monday when he appears in Boston for a fundraising triple-header. (Globe, 4:38 p.m.)

Commission calls for more central control over state's housing authorities

A governor's commission is calling for more centralized control over the state’s housing authorities in the wake of scandals in Chelsea and Medford. (Globe, 3:37 p.m.)

facing Mitt Romney is strong
